name: Ile
bio: Hey, I’m Ile – I’ve been hustling in the freelance design world since 2019. I’ve built brand identities for 50+ startups and now I’m on a mission to help fellow nomads and side-hustlers find their perfect toolkit.

name: Sara Nakamura
bio: What’s up? I’m Sara. Before joining IkoConnect, I ran content at a remote-first SaaS for two years. Now I craft in-depth reviews and guides that actually help you pick the right tools (not just fluff).

name: Thiago Gomes
bio: Oi! I’m Thiago, I build everything under the hood. From our fast Next.js setup to custom API routes for that slick blog generation—if it’s code-related, I’m on it.
